Assignment3

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Assignment3.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The chess board used for the Knights Tours. - Knows the contents of each tile. - Can tell you the contents of any given tile. - Can place a number in a given tile. - Can return the board as a multi-line string.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Creates a new Board and fills all the tiles with a * to mark them as non-visited

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEntry(int row, int col, java.lang.String entry)
      addEntry will add a number on the board to record where the knight stopped at and which stop that was.
      void clearBoard()
      clearBoard is used when we need to empty the board of entries so that a new tour can take place.
      java.lang.String getContents(int row, int col)
      getContents will get the contents of the board at a specified row and column.
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString will return a multi-line string of the chess board and the tour that the knight did across the board.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        Creates a new Board and fills all the tiles with a * to mark them as non-visited

    • Method Detail

      • getContents

        public java.lang.String getContents(int row,
                                    int col)
        getContents will get the contents of the board at a specified row and column.
        Parameters:
        row - The specified row on the board we are looking for.
        col - The specified col on the board we are looking for.
        Returns:
        will return the String that is contained in the spot on the board that we requested

      • addEntry

        public void addEntry(int row,
                     int col,
                     java.lang.String entry)
        addEntry will add a number on the board to record where the knight stopped at and which stop that was.
        Parameters:
        row - the specified row on the board the knight visited.
        col - the specified col on the board the knight visited.
        entry - the String of the stop # that the knight is currently on this will be entered on the board.

      • clearBoard

        public void clearBoard()
        clearBoard is used when we need to empty the board of entries so that a new tour can take place.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString will return a multi-line string of the chess board and the tour that the knight did across the board. This will override the standard toString method in java.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a multi-line string of a chess board and the tour the knight did.
